description:
Ready to escape the Prison in this Pixel style Craft city! A Battle Crime story of a Jail breaker in Robbers World "Block Battles City Crime Defense"

The new prison is coming now with all new survival challenges! Presenting For the first time on your iPhone and iPad. You can explore a new Shooting Game. Be brave and save yourself from the Cops attacker.They will attack on you with Pixel Gun! Try to Shoot them before they will attack on you..

Download Now our new thrilling game "Block Battles City Crime Defense : Pixel war Gun.Craft Sniper Shooting Games" and start shooting...

A Terror story of a Jail breaker in this Hard time Block Battles City Crime Defense game. You have been offender to jail breaker for years for a crime, now you want to escape .Be a Shooter to kill the cops, save yourself!

Use your shooting skills and wisdom and do whatever it takes to escape here. Use your Craft Gun to fight from the Pixel Cops and survive in Robbers World.

***PIXEL STYLE DESIGN ***
1. Sharp shooters Scene, Character and Weapons.
2. Amazing Mini Robbers and Cops. The high quality 3D world craft survival Design.
3. Amazing Pixel style Craft world Environment

Game Features!
*Mini prison to explore and take over the world
*Mission to kill all the Cops to jail breakout
*Incredible weapon and sound effects
*Amazing Blocky cops Robbers city
*Visual Graphics effect with 3D pixel style.
*Super realistic 3D environment
*Get extra points and achievements for special stunts
*Supports Game Center Leaderboards- challenge your friends and beat them
*Complete missions to level up

This new game uses Pixel Gun style and can be enjoyed for unlimited hours. Shooting has never before been so much fun!
